text: @DanielJ88 @WCL_News @RSBenwell @ruthmchambers @Goodwin_Pip @GreenAllianceUK @RSPBNews @GreenerUK_ @DefraGovUK @DefraNature @pow_rebecca @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @10DowningStreet I've said before that #EnvironmentBill targets need to be a mix of both specific targets and indicators of system function. Putting narrow targets on a complex system misses the point about complexity. Having a view on what it looks like when the system functions well is vital.

Focusing on P and N for agri and wastewater is too narrow, would drive narrow solutions. Need to think/act bigger.
